required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Two Formulations of Rivaroxaban Tablets 10 mg in Healthy Male Volunteers in Fasting Conditions
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Crossover 2-Period Single-dose BE Study of Rivaroxaban Film-coated Tablets 10mg (Pharmtechnology LLC, Republic of Belarus) and Xarelto® Film-coated Tablets 10mg (Bayer AG, Germany) in Healthy Male Volunteers in Fasting Conditions

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-labeled, laboratory-blinded, randomized, two period, single-center, crossover, comparative study, where each participant will be randomly assigned to the reference (Xarelto®, 10 mg film-coated tablets) or the test (Rivaroxaban, 10 mg film-coated tablets) formulation in each period of study (sequences Test-Reference (TR) or Reference-Test (RT)), in order to evaluate if both formulations are bioequivalent.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of rivaroxaban in plasma after administration of the test and the reference products.
AUC0-t of rivaroxaban in plasma after administration of the test and the reference.
primary_outcome.description: Cumulative area under the concentration time curve calculated from 0 to time of last observed quantifiable concentration using the linear trapezoidal method

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax of rivaroxaban in plasma after administration of the test and the reference products.
secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum observed concentration; if it occurs at more than one time point, Tmax is defined as the first time point with this value.

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-INF of rivaroxaban in plasma after administration of the test and the reference products.
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration time curve extrapolated to infinity, calculated as AUC0-t + ĈLQC (the predicted concentration at time TLQC) / λZ (apparent elimination rate constant).

secondary_outcome.measure: Residual area of rivaroxaban in plasma after administration of the test and the reference products.
λZ of rivaroxaban in plasma after administration of the test and the reference products.
Terminal elimination half-life (T1/2) of rivaroxaban in plasma after administration of the test and the reference products.
secondary_outcome.description: Terminal elimination half-life, calculated as ln(2)/λZ.

arm_group.description: 17 subjects assigned to the sequence TR will receive a single 10 mg dose of the test product Rivaroxaban (1 x 10 mg tablet), marked as T in the sequence, in Period 1 and a single 10 mg dose of the reference product Xarelto® (1 x 10 mg tablet), marked as R in the sequence, in period 2. These treatments will be administered orally with approximately 200 mL of water, in the morning, after overnight fasting. The tablet must be swallowed whole and must not be chewed or broken.

17 subjects assigned to the sequence RT will receive a single 10 mg dose of the reference product Xarelto® (1 x 10 mg tablet), marked as R in the sequence, in Period 1 and a single 10 mg dose of the test product Rivaroxaban (1 x 10 mg tablet), marked as T in the sequence, in period 2. These treatments will be administered orally with approximately 200 mL of water, in the morning, after overnight fasting. The tablet must be swallowed whole and must not be chewed or broken.

intervention.description: Rivaroxaban is manufactured by Pharmtechnology LLC, Republic of Belarus. Each tablet contains 10 mg of rivaroxaban.
Xarelto® is manufactured by Bayer AG, Germany. Each tablet contains 10 mg of rivaroxaban.

facility.name: Private healthcare institution "Clinical Hospital "RZD-Medicine" of the city of Yaroslavl"
